mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, recommended_type AS type, plan_id AS designPlanId, plan_name AS name, user_id AS createUserId, living_id AS livingId, house_id AS houseId, remark AS remark, is_default_decorate AS isSupportOneKeyDecorate, cover_pic_id AS coverPicId, design_template_id AS designTemplateId, design_recommended_style_id AS designStyleId, gmt_create AS createTime, gmt_modified AS modifyTime, release_time AS publishTime, is_release AS releaseStatus, plan_source AS planSource, is_deleted AS dataIsDeleted FROM design_plan_recommended

SELECT id AS id, recommended_type AS type, plan_id AS designPlanId, plan_name AS name, user_id AS createUserId, living_id AS livingId, house_id AS houseId, remark AS remark, is_default_decorate AS isSupportOneKeyDecorate, cover_pic_id AS coverPicId, design_template_id AS designTemplateId, design_recommended_style_id AS designStyleId, gmt_create AS createTime, gmt_modified AS modifyTime, release_time AS publishTime, is_release AS releaseStatus, plan_source AS planSource, is_deleted AS dataIsDeleted, charge_type AS chargeType, plan_price AS planPrice FROM design_plan_recommended WHERE id IN
#{item}

SELECT DISTINCT c.id FROM design_plan_recommend_favorite_ref a LEFT JOIN sys_business_favorite b ON b.bid = a.fid LEFT JOIN full_house_design_plan c ON c.id = a.full_house_design_plan_id WHERE b.userId = #{userId} AND a.status = 1 AND a.design_plan_type = 1
AND c.plan_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND c.plan_style_id = #{designStyleId}
AND c.is_deleted = 0 order by a.utime DESC

SELECT design_plan_recommended_id + '' AS ids FROM design_plan_recommended_superior WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND space_type != 13 UNION ALL SELECT uuid AS ids FROM full_house_design_plan WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id IN ( SELECT design_plan_recommended_id FROM design_plan_recommended_superior WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND space_type = 13 )
